properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:24AM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...

Choctawhatchee River near Newton (SR 134) affecting Dale County

The Flood Warning continues for
the Choctawhatchee River near Newton (SR 134).
* From Friday afternoon, or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:30 AM Thursday the stage was 8.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
* Forecast: The river is expected to rise to near flood stage
tomorrow early afternoon.
* Impact: At 19.0 feet: Minor flooding will begin to affect farmland
in low lying areas near the Choctawhatchee River.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interest along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts, and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property. Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you
see flood waters: Turn around. Don't drown.

For graphical hydrologic information, please go to weather.gov and
click on your state. Select Rivers and Lakes AHPS under current
conditions and click on your river point.
